metadata.title: CVE-2019-11373 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read in File__Analyze::Get_L8 in File__Analyze_Buffer.cppin MediaInfoLib in MediaArea MediaInfo 18.12 leads to a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1
python-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1
python3-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.12-1ubuntu0.1').
